name: Vitaly
tagline: Hi! I can help with design systems, banners, landings & coding.
about: Designer with 15+ years intensive experience in Interfaces design, web and app design, frontend development.

experience.responsible: content creation, virtual assistant skills, scripting, design, flow, testing, systematization, theming and branding.
experience.achievements: launch and development of the skill News, Sports, Magazine. Launching commercial projects based on skills. Runet Prize 2021

experience.responsible: a) systematization of the design process (design system), writing guidelines, implementation and development of components (IOS, Android, Web), internal team processes (review, design supervision, etc., creation and implementation); b) DrugCode - a platform for creating micro-applications in Sberdrug. Design, systematization, flow, processes.
experience.achievements: a) Creation of a design system, systematization of the design process, implementation and description of the review process and the principles and metrics of the team’s work; b) Implementation of a component system in DrugCode, quality control, review of micro-applications from third-party developers, collection of information and addition to the library of components (IOS, Android, Web).

experience.responsible: user interaction design and interface design, responsive web design, front-end development, graphic design.
experience.achievements: design ans front-end of karusel-tv.ru (Runet Award 2016), domkino.tv, vremya.tv, telecafe.ru, bober.ru(Runet Award 2019), kanal-o.ru, poehali.tv, и etc.

experience.responsible: scripting, design, flow, testing, systematization, theming and branding. Content products. Voice Interfaces.
experience.achievements: Launch and development of 3 applications on TV, SberPortal and mobile phones. Launch of commercial projects based on these applications. The Sport app received the Runet Prize 2021
